column4: I'm using rythembox to play my mp3's, but I want to edit the metadata to organize them. Rythembox doesn't seem to let me do that. Any ideas?
I just tried Easytag. Its nice but not quite as good as I'd like.
Windows Media Player (I can't beleive I'm saying this) allowed me to search for all ot the files that had a certain artist and then change the name of the artist all at once
